title.rendered: HMD Global celebrates its first year in India with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
On 1st Dec 2017, HMD Global celebrated its first year in India with the kids of Smile Foundation. Approximately 60 employees of HMD Global were part of this celebration wherein, they along with the kids of one of our Mission Education centres made cards on the theme of completing one year and this was followed by the cake cutting. The employees and the children had a lot of fun.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 600,000 children and their families every year, through more than 250 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
